content.en: Enhancing medical image fusion: Researchers are exploring ways to improve medical image fusion methods for better contrast and detail information. They are using algorithms such as the normalized coefficient value motivated pulse-coupled neural network and the Gauss-Laplace filter to achieve this. Additionally, convolutional neural networks, Laplacian pyramids, and deep learning technology are being utilized to enhance the quality of medical image fusion.
content.da: Forbedring af medicinsk billedfusion: Forskere undersøger måder at forbedre metoderne til medicinsk billedfusion for bedre kontrast og detaljeinformation. De bruger algoritmer såsom den normaliserede koefficientværdi-motiverede puls-koblet neurale netværk og Gauss-Laplace filteret til at opnå dette. Derudover anvendes konvolutionelle neurale netværk, laplacianske pyramider og dyb læringsteknologi til at forbedre kvaliteten af medicinsk billedfusion.
